name: Spirit Week
description: Participate in Dress-Up days to show spirit for Mason. You can find the themes for each day on social media, student announcements, flyers in the hallways, you can ask a teacher, or reach out to Student Government.

name: Spirit Week (again)
description: Participate in Dress-Up days to show spirit for Mason. You can find the themes for each day on social media, student announcements, flyers in the hallways, you can ask a teacher, or reach out to Student Government.
